title: Rapid literature triage for a scoping review
summary: Speed up abstract screening and clustering while maintaining transparency and reviewer oversight.
workflow: Export candidate abstracts from bibliographic databases.
Cluster topics and draft inclusion/exclusion rationales.
Human reviewers verify decisions and record reasons.
Document prompts, settings, and sampling for reproducibility.
governance_notes: Prefer Public/Internal abstracts; do not upload paywalled full-text outside licensed systems.

title: Qualitative interview coding assistant (human‑in‑the‑loop)
summary: Generate candidate codes and theme suggestions; researchers validate and refine codebooks.
workflow: Generate candidate codes using an approved model or local pipeline.
Researchers refine the codebook and re-code segments.
Audit a sample for consistency and bias.
governance_notes: Transcripts often contain PII; treat as Sensitive/Restricted; keep audit trails and ensure approved storage.
